name: Never Be Angry
description:
Start...Die...Try Again...Repeat

I made a hard game for GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

Your ship has steams out of control. You should control them and reach the goal. But it isn't easy. There are traps everywhere. Can you do this?

You can rotate the ship with A/D or arrow keys or mouse buttons. And you can kill yourself with "space". Good Luck

And thanks for playing my game.
